name: Camelot
description:
Since Erish Friedman had collabs with Clickmazes and whatever who is the other one, I thought I could work with him to make Camelot JR by Smartgames on PuzzleScript. He finished his own final version, so I thought you could check it out.

Erich Friedman :
https://erich-friedman.github.io/

Original game :
https://www.smartgames.eu/uk/one-player-games/camelot-jr

Mobile friendly version :
